txt.en: You aided Fastred against a company of Orcs
The doorwarden at the Mead Hall of Snowbourn informed you that Reeve Fastred was abroad, hunting Orcs.
'Well, there is nothing for it, I suppose. We will have to ride out and meet Fastred.\n\n'Go to the stables and inform the others. I will meet you at Fastred's camp.'
Ulf, Léofdag, and Hutha are waiting near the stables.\n\nBurnoth asked you to inform his Riders that he would meet you and them at Reeve Fastred's camp in the Sutcrofts.

'It was a battle well-fought, but I am distressed that Fastred refuses still to evacuate the women and children. If the invasion reaches the Sutcrofts, there will be a great slaughter.

'Well, there is naught more we can do. We must ride to Edoras and hope that Théoden King will hear a voice other than that of Wormtongue.

'Fare-thee-well, friend. May your travels bear you hence, so that we may meet again.'
Ulf the Reaver is at the stables of Snowbourn.\n\nYou should speak with Ulf the Reaver when you are ready to depart for Fastred's camp.
Burnoth is outside the Mead Hall of Snowbourn.\n\nYou should speak with Burnoth regarding the experience in the Sutcrofts.
'If Fastred craves the blood of Orcs, then I say we help him get it!\n\n'What say you?'
Talk to the Riders Four in Snowbourn
Talk to Ulf to ride out into the Sutcrofts to meet Fastred
Talk to Burnoth outside the Mead Hall of Snowbourn
